summary:
Sad Hill Unearthed (Spanish: Desenterrando Sad Hill) is a 2017 Spanish documentary film directed by Guillermo de Oliveira.
It has interviews with Clint Eastwood, Ennio Morricone, and stars Metallica. It was released at Sitges Film Festival. It is set in the locations where The Good, the Bad and the Ugly was shot, including Sad Hill Cemetery where Clint Eastwood, Lee Van Cleef and Eli Wallach had their showdown. The documentary shows the reconstruction of the cemetery.It was nominated for Goya Awards for Best Documentary Film.
